Text: Well I can't comment on this particular crop of videos, I can say as a comic fan that this was a great season to start off with! Easily Marvel's best series in a long time...You've got a lot of individual episodes and the main threat that ends the season is sprinkled about throughout the run. And it sets up next year with an obvious "Secret Invasion" story line...bring it!
